title: Music & Rhythm

questions.text: When a great song comes on when we're together, I hope we...
choices: Dance together, even if it's silly
Sing along and share the moment
Just enjoy it and soak it in together
Share why this song means something to me
Other / It depends

questions.text: For a morning together at home, the soundtrack would be...
choices: Upbeat music to start the day energized
Something calm and easy while we wake up
Podcast or news we can chat about
Quiet - mornings are for peaceful silence
Other / It depends

questions.text: If we went to a concert or live show together, I'd want us to...
choices: Be up front, fully in the experience
Dance and sing along with the crowd
Find a good spot to enjoy the music comfortably
Enjoy it from the back with space to breathe
Other / It depends

questions.text: A song that makes me think of us would probably be about...
choices: The feeling of being in love
Going through life's ups and downs together
Having fun and enjoying the moment
Something deeper - connection, meaning, or growth
Other / It depends

questions.text: If we're both working or doing our own thing in the same room, I'd prefer...
choices: Some background music playing softly
Headphones - we each have our own vibe
Silence so we can both focus
Whatever you're in the mood for - I'm flexible
Other / It depends

description: Discover your soundtrack as a couple.
